mapper.sql: select a.user_id, a.user_name, a.user_nickname, a.user_phone, b.address, b.registration_number from user_info as a left outer join company_info as b on a.user_id = b.user_id
mapper.select: select a.user_id, a.user_name, a.user_nickname, a.user_phone, a.user_role, b.address, b.registration_number from user_info as a inner join company_info as b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_id, user_password, user_name, user_phone, user_nickname, user_role) values(#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userNickname}, #{userRole})
mapper.select: select count(user_id) from user_info where user_id = #{userId}

select a.user_id, a.user_name, a.user_nickname, a.user_phone, a.user_role, b.address, b.registration_number from user_info as a inner join company_info as b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update user_info set is_deleted = 0 where user_id = #{userId}
